definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: We can't get unwary just because nothing unusual has cropped up.
sentences.chinese: 不能因为没发生什么问题就麻痹大意起来。

sentences.english: There's just a lot of ignorance and second-rate piping out there.
sentences.chinese: 有太多的麻痹大意和二流管道。

sentences.english: A look at the two slow three through a catastrophe, careless.
sentences.chinese: 一看二慢三通过，麻痹大意闯大祸。

definition: to neglect to take precautions/relaxed vigilance
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to relax/to relax efforts/to slack off/to take it easy/complacent/undisciplined
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to have an opportunity that one can exploit (idiom)
to prevent troubles before the event (idiom)/to forestall/to nip sth in the bud
to lose Jingzhou due to carelessness (idiom)/to suffer a major setback due to negligence
to meet with unexpected failure (idiom)/to fail miserably (where failure was not expected)
